overview: Fabio and Manuel have 2 boys who are struggling to make ends meet due to the lack of a job, Walter, Geky and Manuel are in dire need of money to settle a debt with a loan shark known place of The Prince. The two groups will opt for the best solution 'drastic: a bank robbery! The trouble is they will choose the same day and the same bank for the hit ....
title: Polesine Bastard
